ModMetaData.name: [LYN] Farmland
ModMetaData.author: Lyn the Cookie
ModMetaData.description:
This mod removes the tilled soil from Vanilla Plants Expanded and adds these new floors: - Farmland: 140% fertility, can be built soil, marshy soil and lichen-covered soil - Rich Farmland: 180% fertility, can only be built on rich soil - Poor Farmland: 100% fertility, can be built on sand and gravel
Update 1/Dec/2021 - Added Poor Farmland, added all three versions as a dropdown group, added 'Diggable' tag to all farmlands, and added support to Advanced Biomes (Continued).
